action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: A snowy slope with four skiers and one snowboarder. The snowboarder is at the bottom of the image, and the skiers are above them. The skiers are all wearing black jackets and pants, and the snowboarder is wearing a black jacket and pants. The skiers are all holding ski poles, and the snowboarder is holding a snowboard. The snow is white and there are some tracks in it. There is a small rock formation in the upper left corner of the image.
